name: Victory Lane (benjames171)
description:
Simple overhead car racing game with a retro feel.

Race 4 tracks against the computer cars.

This game is currently a packaged up prototype and may be developed further in the future if there is enough demand.

Controls
WASD or cursor keys : accelerate/brake/steer

Contact
